snippet: Television pilots are moving from networks to streaming services online, Fox plans to take on ESPN with Fox Sports 1 and San Francisco becomes a center for innovative advertisers.
abstract: Television pilots are moving from networks to streaming services online, Fox plans to take on ESPN with Fox Sports 1 and San Francisco becomes a center for innovative advertisers.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: TV Pilots Move to the Web and Fox Prepares to Take On ESPN
